experience.title: Research Associate
experience.description: Project on ‘Implementing Sustainability Initiatives’ to impact the 2K+ residents of the IIMB campus▪ Rectified 5% energy mismatch by scrutinizing performances of 400+ solar modules using data analysis - Projected an annual reduction of 1.2T CO2 by proposing 100 new solar modules to provide 5 % electricity▪ Aided in formulating a compulsory case study for MBA students to raise awareness about circular economy- Conducted interviews & site visits to discern 5+ classifications & techniques used for 3Rs by an NGO▪ Presented a tailored report by scrutinizing carbon footprints on 10+ common routes used by residents- Estimated footprints of 5+ travelling options using specific Indian GHGP factor reports & 5+ calculators
